abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "GadmGid is MDG", "Geometry POLYGON((49.36929 -16.91721,49.83544 -16.88654,49.93664 -16.63814,49.99491 -16.14746,49.36929 -16.14746,49.36929 -16.91721))" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Reptiles & Amphibians 1 records from P herbarium - Muséum national d’histoire naturelle, Paris - Amostras Brasileiras Repatriadas - Herbário Virtual REFLORA 1 records from New combinations and typifications in Vitex (Lamiaceae) from Madagascar 1 records from Observatoire Pelagis aerial surveys 2002-2021 1 records from Thunberga gen. nov., a new genus of huntsman spiders from Madagascar (Araneae: Sparassidae: Heteropodinae) 1 records from Royal Museum of Central Africa - True Fruit Flies (Diptera, Tephritidae) of the Afrotropical Region (ENBI wp13) 1 records from Botany (UPS) 1 records from Botanical Database of Southern Africa (BODATSA): Botanical Collections 1 records from Botanical Research Institute of Texas, Philecology Herbarium 1 records from A taxonomic study of Dinapsis Waterson, 1922 from Madagascar (Hymenoptera Megalyridae, Dinapsini): crested wasps of the hirtipes species-group 1 records from Database about reference specimens for medicinal plants, in the Apocynaceae family, owned by CNARP 1 records from The molluscs collection (IM) of the Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 1 records from University of Vienna, Institute for Botany - Herbarium WU 1 records from Ecology and morphology of mouse lemurs (Microcebus spp.) in a hotspot of microendemism in northeastern Madagascar, with the description of a new species 1 records from University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Fishes 1 records from Gastrodia madagascariensis (Gastrodieae, Orchidaceae): from an historical designation to a description of a new species from Madagascar 1 records from Nouveautés taxonomiques et nomenclaturales dans le genre Pteris L.
